Description: Determines if an employee’s assignment number matches a predefined list of specific assignment numbers (e.g., E33189, E52801, etc.). If the assignment number matches any in the list, it sets l_selected to 'Y'; otherwise, it sets l_selected to 'N'. Logs the result for debugging purposes. Returns 'Y' or 'N' to indicate whether the employee is selected.

FORMULA_TEXT:
DEFAULT FOR PER_ASG_ASSIGNMENT_NUMBER IS 'X'
l_selected = 'N'

x = ess_log_write('Person selection Assignment Number: ' + PER_ASG_ASSIGNMENT_NUMBER)

x = ess_log_write('Increment Eligible: ' + l_increment_eligible)

if l_increment_eligible <>'X' then
(
 l_selected = 'Y'
)

RETURN l_selected

Description: Determines if an employee under LBH (likely a business unit or region) should be excluded from receiving increments. Checks criteria such as assignment status, service tenure (less than or equal to 6 months for new starters between October 1 and March 31), grade ceiling status, people group segments (e.g., Casuals, Sessional LG), standard working hours (zero hours), employee type (Contingent Worker), specific position names (e.g., casual or part-time roles), and department (Newham Employee). Logs debug information for tracking. Returns 'Y' if eligible for increment, 'N' if excluded.

)

(
l_selected = 'N'
)

return l_selected

DEFAULT For PER_ASG_PERSON_NUMBER is 'XXABC'
DEFAULT FOR PER_ASG_USER_PERSON_TYPE is 'X'

ASG_NUMBER = 'X'
ASG_NUMBER = PER_ASG_ASSIGNMENT_NUMBER
l_hr_asg_id = ASG_HR_ASG_ID
L_ELIGIBLE='Y'
l_start_dt='0001/01/01 00:00:00' (date)

 

 

 

ASG_STATUS = 'XXX'
ASG_STATUS = PER_ASG_ASSIGNMENT_STATUS_TYPE_LOOKUP_MEANING
l_hr_asg_id = ASG_HR_ASG_ID
L_ELIGIBLE='Y'
l_start_dt='0001/01/01 00:00:00' (date)

 

 

 

 x = ess_log_write('----------in person selection for '||PER_ASG_ASSIGNMENT_NUMBER )
 x = ess_log_write('----------in person selection for Asg Status '||PER_ASG_ASSIGNMENT_STATUS_TYPE_LOOKUP_MEANING )

 


CHANGE_CONTEXTS(EFFECTIVE_DATE = GET_CONTEXT(EFFECTIVE_DATE,'4712/12/31 00:00:00' (date)))
(
l_start_dt = PER_ASG_REL_DATE_START

 

Current_date=get_context(effective_date, '0001/01/01 00:00:00'(date))
Service_months=0

 

x = ess_log_write('Current_date ' + to_char(Current_date,'DD-Mon-YYYY'))

 

 
if ACP_HIRE_DATE was defaulted then
(
l_start_dt = PER_ASG_REL_DATE_START
)
else
(
l_start_dt = ACP_HIRE_DATE
)
)

 

Service_months = MONTHS_BETWEEN(Current_date,l_start_dt)

 

x = ess_log_write(' Start Date: ' + to_char(l_start_dt))
x = ess_log_write(' Length of Service: ' + to_char(Service_months))

 


l_sub_date = substr(to_char(Current_date),1,10)
l_yyyy = substr(l_sub_date,1,4)
l_mm = substr(l_sub_date,6,2)
l_dd = substr(l_sub_date,9,2)
l_debug = ess_log_write('l_yyyy= '+ (l_yyyy))
l_debug = ess_log_write('l_mm= '+ (l_mm))
l_debug = ess_log_write('l_dd= '+ (l_dd))

 


Ceiling_Step  = (GET_VALUE_SET('LBN_CELLING_STEP','|=P_ASSIGNMENT_ID='''||to_char(l_hr_asg_id)||''''||'|P_YEAR='''||(l_yyyy)||''''|| '|P_MONTH=''' ||(l_mm)||''''||'|P_DAY='''||(l_dd)||''''))

 

 
x = ess_log_write(' Grade Ceiling Step: ' + (Ceiling_Step))
 
if to_char(Current_date,'YYYY') = to_char(l_start_dt , 'YYYY')
then
l_date = Current_date
else
l_date = add_months(Current_date , -12)

 


x = ess_log_write(' l_date: ' + to_char(l_date))
x = ess_log_write(' lookup meaning: ' + PER_ASG_ASSIGNMENT_STATUS_TYPE_LOOKUP_MEANING)

 


if Ceiling_Step = 'Y'
THEN
(
L_ELIGIBLE='N'
x = ess_log_write('Employee Reached ceiling point ')
)
 

 


IF(           

 

     (to_date(to_char(l_start_dt , 'DD-MM-YYYY')) >= to_date('1-10-'||to_char(l_date , 'YYYY')))
     and 
     (to_date(to_char(l_start_dt , 'DD-MM-YYYY')) <= to_date('31-03-'||to_char(l_date , 'YYYY')))
     AND Service_months <=6
     
 )
THEN
(
L_ELIGIBLE='N'
x = ess_log_write('new starters condition')
)

 


IF (PER_ASG_PEOPLE_GROUP_SEGMENT1= 'Casuals' OR PER_ASG_PEOPLE_GROUP_SEGMENT1 = 'Sessional LG')
THEN
(
L_ELIGIBLE='N'
x = ess_log_write('PPG T & C condition: ')
)

 


IF (PER_ASG_STANDARD_WORKING_HOURS = 0)
THEN
(
L_ELIGIBLE='N'
x = ess_log_write('Working Hours condition: ')
)




l_type = PER_ASG_USER_PERSON_TYPE


IF (l_type = 'Contingent Worker') THEN
(

l_Sal_review_date = CMP_ASSIGNMENT_SALARY_NEXT_REVIEW_DATE
l_salary_basis_id = CMP_ASSIGNMENT_SALARY_BASIS_ID
l_Elig_flag='N'
l_eff_date1=add_months(l_eff_date,1)

l_last_date=Last_day(l_eff_date1)

l_param = '|=ASSIGNMENT_ID='''||to_char(l_hr_assign_id)||''''

l_Sal_review_date_latest=GET_VALUE_SET('WCC_COMP_SAL_REVIEW_DATE_VS',l_param)

l_Sal_review_date=to_date(l_Sal_review_date_latest,'DD/MM/YYYY')

RET= SET_LOG('l_eff_date is ' ||TO_CHAR(l_eff_date,'DD/MM/YYYY'))

RET5=SET_LOG('l_Sal_review_date_latest ' || l_Sal_review_date_latest)

RET2=SET_LOG('ASSIGNMENT ID ' ||l_param)

if (l_salary_basis_id= 300000006007495)
 THEN RET6= SET_LOG('Salary Basis: Collective Agreement Salary Basis')
 else RET7= SET_LOG('Salary Basis: Non Collective Agreement Salary Basis')




If ((l_salary_basis_id = 300000006007495) and (l_Sal_review_date>=l_eff_date1 and l_Sal_review_date<=l_last_date))
then l_Elig_flag='Y'
Else l_Elig_flag='N'

RETVAL = l_Elig_flag

Return RETVAL
